snippet: Kermit Gosnell, who is serving life in prison for killing newborns delivered in late-term abortions, admitted Tuesday that he sold prescriptions to addicts and dealers who lined up at his office.
abstract: Kermit Gosnell, Philadelphia doctor serving life in prison for killing newborns delivered in late-term abortions, admits that he sold prescriptions for OxyContin and other drugs to addicts and dealers who lined up at his office.
lead_paragraph: Kermit Gosnell, who is serving life in prison for killing newborns delivered in late-term abortions, admitted Tuesday that he sold prescriptions to addicts and dealers who lined up at his office.
